hero.title: About Tolido
hero.subtitle: Bringing quality to every table since the 1990s.

paragraphs: We are Tolido — a company proudly producing and distributing a diverse range of high-quality food and beverage products under our own brand name, Tolido.

Founded in the late 1990s by Mr. Anas Talas and Mr. Mouayad Talas, Tolido began as a small startup with a clear vision and a strong belief in potential and persistence. Over the years, our commitment to excellence and customer trust has driven us to expand globally, establishing multiple branches and a wide network of distributors around the world.

Our product portfolio includes a broad selection of items such as tuna, mushrooms, sweet corn, fava beans, corned beef, rice, liquid products, and sardines, among others. Every product that carries the Tolido name stands as a symbol of quality, reliability, and great value.

At Tolido, our vision is to be the first choice for customers around the world. We believe in customer satisfaction, competitive pricing, and a diverse product line that meets the needs of retailers, wholesalers, distributors, importers, and end consumers alike.
With a growing global presence and a passion for excellence, Tolido continues to bring quality to every table.
